verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after they were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Let the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> also <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> at his appointed <S%H4150>season<s%>.

In the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of this <S%H2320>month<s%>, at <S%H6153>even<s%>, you shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> it in his appointed <S%H4150>season<s%>: according to all the <S%H2708>rites<s%> of <S%H4941>it<s%>, and according to all the ceremonies <S%H6213>there<s%>, shall you keep it.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they should <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%>.

And they <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>: according to all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And there were certain <S%H582>men<s%>, who were <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the dead <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>, that they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>: and they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>:

And <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2931>him<s%>, We are defiled by the dead <S%H5315>body<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%>: why are we kept <S%H1639>back<s%>, that we may not <S%H7126>offer<s%> an <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in his appointed <S%H4150>season<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5975>them<s%>, Stand still, and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> what the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will command concerning <S%H6680>you<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of you or of your <S%H1755>posterity<s%> shall be <S%H2931>unclean<s%> by reason of a dead <S%H5315>body<s%>, or be in a <S%H1870>journey<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>, yet he shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

The <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> they shall <S%H6213>keep<s%> <S%H398>it<s%>, and eat it with unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> and bitter <S%H4844>herbs<s%>.

They shall <S%H7604>leave<s%> none of it unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, nor <S%H7665>break<s%> any <S%H6106>bone<s%> of <S%H2708>it<s%>: according to all the ordinances of the <S%H6453>passover<s%> they shall keep <S%H6213>it<s%>.

But the <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H2889>clean<s%>, and is not in a <S%H1870>journey<s%>, and <S%H2308>forbeareth<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, even the same <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from among his <S%H5971>people<s%>: because he <S%H7126>brought<s%> not the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in his appointed <S%H4150>season<s%>, that <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> his <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

And if a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> shall <S%H1481>stay<s%> among <S%H6213>you<s%>, and will keep the <S%H6453>passover<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; according to the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%>, and according to the <S%H4941>manner<s%> <S%H6213>there<s%>, so shall he do: you shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%>, both for the <S%H1616>stranger<s%>, and for him that was <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

And on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> was reared <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, <S%H168>namely<s%>, the tent of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>: and at <S%H6153>even<s%> there was upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> as it were the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>, until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.
So it was <S%H8548>always<s%>: the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> it by <S%H4758>day<s%>, and the appearance of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>.

And <S%H6310>when<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> from the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, then <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>: and in the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>lived<s%>, there the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> pitched their <S%H2583>tents<s%>.

At the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>, and at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H2583>pitched<s%>: as long <S%H3117>as<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H7931>lived<s%> upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> they rested in their <S%H2583>tents<s%>.

And when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> stayed <S%H748>long<s%> upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and journeyed <S%H5265>not<s%>.

And so it <S%H3426>was<s%>, when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was a <S%H4557>few<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>; according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H2583>lived<s%> in their <S%H6310>tents<s%>, and according to the commandment of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>.

And so it <S%H3426>was<s%>, when the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> lived from <S%H6153>even<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, then they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>: whether it was by <S%H3119>day<s%> or by <S%H3915>night<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> was taken <S%H5927>up<s%>, they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>.

Or whether it were two <S%H3117>days<s%>, or a <S%H2320>month<s%>, or a <S%H3117>year<s%>, that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H748>stayed<s%> upon the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, <S%H7931>remaining<s%> on <S%H1121>it<s%>, the sons of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>lived<s%> in their <S%H5265>tents<s%>, and journeyed <S%H5927>not<s%>: but when it was taken up, they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>.

At the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H2583>rested<s%> in the <S%H6310>tents<s%>, and at the commandment of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%>: they <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, at the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
